titleStmt.title: De bello Belgico The history of the Low-Countrey warres / written in Latine by Famianus Strada ; in English by Sr. Rob. Stapylton.
titleStmt.author: Strada, Famiano, 1572-1649.
Stapylton, Robert, Sir, d. 1669.

notesStmt.note: Translation of the first only of the two decades of the author's De bello Belgico, which was first published at Rome, 1632-1647.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
